FuncDef: The display qos ecn threshold command displays information about the ECN threshold. The display qos ecn threshold command displays information about the ECN threshold.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
